website_summaries.verdict: A nice mix of sparkling water and fruit juice that may help soda drinkers trying to quit.
pros: Spindrift is made with real fruit juice and no added sugar
With its pretty packaging, the variety pack allows you to try lemon, raspberry lime, grapefruit, and orange mango flavors
cons: More comparable to a carbonated fruit juice

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. Kind of underwhelming. I wasn’t expecting them to have fruit juices in them (natural flavoring, great, but). I was thinking they would be something along the lines of a La Croix but no. The juice means they have a small amount of calories. I drink these to sort of satiate myself on a low calorie diet. The carbonation seems weak to me also. I need my senses assaulted by a blast of bubbles to boost my neurotransmitters that are all in meh-mode on a restricted diet. Sorry, these didn’t do it for me. Someone else might like them, though. The grapefruit flavored one was the most enjoyable, I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not good - doesn't taste nice at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but saw this advertised on a website with a direct link to Amazon (I assume some kind of targeted advertising - which is fine). I thought from the reviews this was somewhat like Izzy drink. It's not - really not at all flavorful or nice-tasting, my son who likes Izzy hated it. It's basically slightly-flavored water that doesn't taste much like the fruit depicted on the can. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: HiDefGuy

customer_reviews.title: Water is Better
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different carbonated drinks. I ruled out the ones using high fructose corn syrup, sucrolose, or artificial sweeteners even though some tasted wonderful. Orange Fanta European version is the best. Pellegrino is almost as good (it doesn't have an option that tastes like orange though) and with less sugar. but these both have high sugar levels. Spindrift is the best healthy option with juice (and some sugar from the juice) , water, carbonation, and you could drink large amounts with no health problems. I just don't feel satisfied when I drink a Spindrift so will just drink tap water and eat fruit. The Amazon mixed pack is a good deal if you want to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Bitter tasting.
customer_reviews.text: I do love seltzer water. Flavored or unflavored. This I did not like. It tasted like they used the rinds of fruit to give it the flavor, and it was bitter. I like the seltzer without sugar or aspertain. And neither of these would have helped the flavor. But too each his own.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Best sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many sparkling waters with 'natural flavor' and artificial sweeteners and I didn't like any of them. I loved the Izze drinks but they are high in calories. I love the Spindrift sparkling waters, and they are very low in calories. No artifical ingredients. I tried to recreate them at home but they weren't as good. I've tried all the berry variety flavor and the grapefruit. I loved them all. I also love tart tangy food and drinks. I buy them by the case now, have at least one every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but delicious and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and refreshing. They are a step up from the Poland Spring flavored water we are used to drinking. These are not really sweet, They are basically like if you took some club soda and put a little juice in it, So not sweet but not bitter. You can tell there's actual fruit juice in this, it doesn't taste artificial. The carbonation is pleasant but not overly fizzy. If you enjoy water with a splash of lemon, raspberry, or grapefruit juice, you will love these.
customer_reviews.author: PhysGirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This sucks. Spent 18 or so dollars on this variety pack. Was excited because saw someone say it taste better than bai bubbles. WRONG. It taste like club soda and the flavors are horrible. I wanted to buy just a few cans, but couldn't. also if one flavor was good enough then I could buy those pack only I'm pissed. Going to have to pour this out.
customer_reviews.author: Scared v

customer_reviews.title: How can people actually drink this?
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous flavored, non sweetened drinks, both with sparkling water and not. I was unable to even finish the first can. I threw out the entire case. Made me nauseous. I am confused as to why this is so highly rated. The grape tasted like someone took a teaspoon oh Torrington grape jelly, and mixed it into the water ( thus, my nausea). Never tried anything so...disgusting. I tried another brand that is just the lightest essence of a fruit with fresh water- quite nice- this is NOT that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good flavors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased their sampler carton based on the carb information on the lemon drink at 1 Carb total and 0 sugars which was used for their advert. Their other drinks in this carton are grapefruit which has 4g of Carbs. And orange which has 3 carbs . Raspberry is 2g. I am on a strict Keto plan for my heath which means 10 of the 20 cans of soda water are to high in carbs for me to stay in my healthy range, so I gave them away. Having said that, the Lemon and Raspberry Sodas have great carbonation and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Great brand - some dented cans, different expiration dates
customer_reviews.text: First, I would like to say, love spindrift brand. Other sparkling water can't beat the ingredients. Mango flavor doesn't have a strong enough taste though - not a huge fan, but if you put ice cubes in it, it's not too bad. It also may just be my batch or shipping handling, but most cans were a dented on the edge - other wise okay, and expiration date for different flavors varied. I'm not sure if single cans were just put together - the seller was Amazon Services, so just keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Fellow Amazon Member

customer_reviews.title: Can Exploded
customer_reviews.text: Went to open these today after a few successful deliveries in previous months and a can burst open!! Thankfully my face wasn't too close! I love these beverages but I'm not sure about the packaging or delivering, maybe better to buy in the store?
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, but no "value" for buying more
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Spindrift and this flavor variety does not disappoint. But after doing some of the math, this is not a good deal... Looks like a usual 8 pack goes for about $5-6, making it around $0.63 a can. But this pack is (was - at the time I bought it) 20 cans for $22, a whopping $0.90 per can. Not a huge difference, but still bummed I paid more for the "value" pack!! I know it's my fault so just want to spread the word to others to check twice before buying! It adds up when you go through as many as I do 😂
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible - threw away almost my entire order
customer_reviews.text: My usual favorite brands - LaCroix and Bubly- we’re not available so I ordered two cases of Spindrift. This is the worst-tasting beverage that I’ve ever had. Over the course of a week, I tried to get through them but after trying each putrid flavor, literally threw away the rest- nearly two cases. If you think these will taste like other sparkling water brands, you’ll be totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Flavors are a bit bitter
customer_reviews.text: I drink sparkling flavored waters daily. I wanted a product that would flavor the water with natural flavors. I thought this would be the product. I tried a can at Whole foods and thought I would get a case. I did not like the flavors I received in the case. The flavors were bitter tasting almost sour. The lemon was the worst. I thought the flavors in the case would be as good as the flavor I purchased at WF. I am trying to finish the case but I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT like the taste
customer_reviews.text: This drink is just gross. I’m not a person who drinks soda or sugary drinks. I don’t eat processed food, so if you are thinking it’s a tastebud thing, I would disagree. I’m not super picky about the seltzer/sparkling water I drink. Most of the time I purchase store brand. But with Covid, I’m trying not to go to the store. I saw this and figured with the high reviews I would try it. I’m very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Now I drink carbonated water!
customer_reviews.text: I love these waters. I don't like bubly, or la Croix or even regular and flavored Perrier. I usually don't like carbonated water at all. I am super into these. These don't have the weird after taste that the others do, but are satisfying enough that I don't feel like I want a soda either. SO grateful for this option!
customer_reviews.author: Boh

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes disgusting. There are a lot of flavored Seltzer's doing it right. This is doing it wrong. Trader joe's makes one that actually tastes good. So does la croix and s pellegrino. I got this in an Amazon prime deal and it was a big waste of money. I tested a few to make sure it wasn't just one flavor they are all disgusting. Litterally anyone makes them better than this maybe similar to Waterloo but Waterloo tastes better and is bad too. Good luck if you get this. It does smell a bit better than it tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Addictive.
customer_reviews.text: Completely addicted to these, over all other soda or carbonated beverages. Best flavors, in my opinion, are lemon and raspberry lime--super tart and refreshing. Less acidic flavors are the mango/orange and grapefruit (which is probably why I like them less, though someone who likes more mild flavors will probably love these.) I recommend trying the blackberry and lime flavors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ilana M Garon

customer_reviews.title: Merely my opinion, but I didn’t like any of the favors
customer_reviews.text: (To me) each one tasted “tinny” and chemical. Maybe the berry flavors taste better? I know that it is advertised as ‘just juice’ not anything artificial.. Maybe some stevia would have helped a little? I tried to wish the drinks off on my son, but he didn’t like any of the flavors either. We finally just tossed the rest of the cans. We hated to do it, but....
customer_reviews.author: Dizzynomore

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Was never a big fan of sparkling water, but I thought I would try this since it had fruit in it. It's actually very good! Has great fruit flavor without that sweetness. I would definitely recommend this refreshing drink!
customer_reviews.author: R. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Cans came smushed 3 with holes
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to the few that made it, although not sure I want to try. EBT order. First order didn't get here. Finally got a replacement order. This came with cans leaking in the box and squished cans 3 cans ok. No credit back to EBT, and how much is AMAZON stock worth? Lots more than a case of this water that was a big treat. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mars

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: As a conventional soda drinker, I expect bold flavor in my fizzy drinks. This brand is very good. They really walk the line between having a good bold flavor, and not enough like in other flavored seltzer water brands. I think the cans have 5 calories which is insane considering how good they taste. My preference would be slightly stronger flavor, maybe bringing it up to 10 calories. But overall this is an amazing flavor as-is and I think most people will like it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Acquired Taste
customer_reviews.text: First time trying these and they are not bad. They are a healthier alternative to sweeter drinks. I have an accustomed taste to La Croix and still prefer that over these. All in all though i think it is a great alternative to sodas and things like orange juice and apple juice!
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: New Flavor For Me
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told, I haven't tried this flavor yet. My all-time favorite is Cucumber, but I don't think it's made anymore. I sure can't find it at our local healthfood stores. I like all the other ones I've tried. We'll crack these open soon. Get the Cucumber if you can ever find it . . .
customer_reviews.author: @your6Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry and blackberry are excellent, raspberry flavors are okay
customer_reviews.text: The strawberry and blackberry flavors are REALLY good - they taste exactly like what you'd expect if you mashed up some berries and added them to soda water. Very fresh and natural tasting, a big step up from the artificial-tasting LaCroix IMO. There is zero added sugar though, so don't expect much sweetness or big flavor, it's just a hint of berry. The mixed raspberry flavors are kinda meh though and the flavors don't mix that well and tend to drown out the raspberry flavor. Would've preferred just a straight raspberry flavor. They aren't bad so worth a try if the mixed flavors sound interesting to you.
customer_reviews.author: M. George Hansen

customer_reviews.title: The best bubbly water
customer_reviews.text: I love spindrift!!!! Love it love it love it! And, they're honest about their ingredients. Not like this other brands. I'm going to buy more! Nike that there's definitely a strong flavor here, so try a can if you can before you get a big box
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Best soda option out there
customer_reviews.text: This is best possible option for people who don't like the weird menthol aftertaste of standard seltzer water, or the million grams of high fructose corn syrup in regular sodas. It's clean and fresh tasting, and there are no added sugars or sugar alternatives. Thank you for something that's just naturally low sugar! A little pricey per can, but worth it to have something to drink that won't wreck my health.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I am diabetic
customer_reviews.text: I can't drink soda or fruit juice all day, but I love the fizzy, and all those fake sweet chems just freak out ny taste buds. So all natural fruit flavorings is what I go for. BUT what did I actually do? I buy a big bottle of vodka some limes, and some grenadine and made a bunch of tasty drinks, totally negated the reason I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product / Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am newly in love with Spindrift sparkling water. They are delicious and I probably drink two a day at this point. That said, their packaging needs some serious work. The aluminum seems thinner than other canned drinks. I ordered a variety case and 18 of the 20 cans were dented in at least 3 or more places. One can split open completely right down the center. While the contents are still super delicious, it definitely cheapens the look of the brand when I am attending meetings with cans that look beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great sparkling water, but with juice it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are much sweeter than the essence sparkling waters (which I love too). There is real juice in here, so the taste and texture is different. One of my favorite beverages to have in my fridge; much lower sugar than soda, a bit more than sparkling water.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob and Kiki HantlaTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo Good!
customer_reviews.text: I always drink my favorite sparkling mineral water, but been trying to find a natural fruit flavored sparkling water that is really healthy and good! With that being said; this is the BEST & only flavored sparkling water😃 I will be purchasing! Now I’m going to change my automatic delivery date! LOL 😆
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: sweet nectar of the Gods
customer_reviews.text: Spindrift might cost as much as beer, but it tastes great, is very refreshing and is a great beer alternative for older folks (post 20's) who need something refreshing that isn't too sweet and also won't make them fat. I do wish there was an option to rotate more flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M

customer_reviews.title: A must have drink!
customer_reviews.text: Spindrift has become one of my favorite sparkling water brands quite quickly. I wanted to try out this four pack because my local stores didn’t carry but a few flavors. The raspberry lime is my #1 choice, following is the neat mix of orange mango! I am looking forward to tasting cranberry raspberry and blackberry soon!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Herman

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I hate La Croix because all of the flavors taste like fruit with low battery. I love San Pellegrino flavored waters, but they're basically sodas with the amount of sugar they have. Spindrift was recommended to me and it is the happy medium I have been searching for. I like the lemon and grapefruit flavors the best. Lightly sweet, refreshing, low sugar content but still flavorful, and about 5-17 calories/can depending on the flavor. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Blech
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like these. They taste like a seltzer water where someone left some old fruit sitting in the bottom to get that hint of flavor. Not my thing at all. I will stick with other brands -- right now the Wegmans store brand has a lot of good sparkling water flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jecausta

customer_reviews.title: Easy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love spindrift sparkling water and this variety case. The only flavor I don't love is the grapefruit, but I would still order this again. Some of the cans had little dents on them but this didn't effect flavor or freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Laundress

customer_reviews.title: Purchase outside of Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the ingredients are good/real. Problem is it just doesn't frizz/sparkle. Might want to find a different Store outside Amazon. My local grocery store has a great frizz drink for about $0.50 each for a 32 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Not a similar product
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I don’t usually write reviews. I was shopping for flavored waters like bubly, AHA, and La croix products. This product was recommended as a similar product during my search so I bought a couple of cases. This product is nothing like the other water products I listed. To ME this product was horrible and I threw 1 case away. I kept the other to give some of the product to others to see if they would like it. 3 family members and 2 neighbors all agreed it was not good/very bad and rather than drink it they dumped it out.. sorry spindrift...
customer_reviews.author: Michael-Denver

customer_reviews.title: On the sour side
customer_reviews.text: If you like sour drinks, these are for you. I could take all but the raspberry, which to me was bitter. Since both mixed packages included the raspberry/lime flavor I unsubscribed.
customer_reviews.author: Angitech

customer_reviews.title: Lemon is the best flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t an exceptional value or anything, I feel like they’re cheaper at the store. I just like the flavor variety and the ease of having them shipped to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.reeves

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take like seltzer water
customer_reviews.text: These drinks are awful tasting. We drink a lot of flavored brands of seltzer/sparkling water and since Amazon was out of our regulars, we tried this. They are disgusting. None of the 5 of us liked them and I will try to give them away.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Not that great!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm not a sparkling water kind of gal cuz these are gross lol the Raspberry Lime is horrible. I tolerated the grapefruit and the orange mango and haven't tried the lemon cuz I'm scared! I suppose I had a different idea of what sparkling water would be like....now I know and it isn't awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: not worth the extra$$
customer_reviews.text: I buy Bubbly all the time.. It suits me but Amazon was out of variety pack so I thought I'd give Spindrift a go. The cost was double from Bubbly. I don't care for it as much as Bubbly..
customer_reviews.author: lola's mom

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money. They ALL taste TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to say that I actually gave away almost the entire case to someone. Myself (and someone else) sampled each flavor in this variety pack and EVERY SINGLE FLAVOR ended up getting thrown away unfinished. Trust me, we gave them more than just a sip. I couldn't imagine how flavored seltzer could be so bad until I tried Spindrift. First and last time.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Burst of Flavor without Calories
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, packaged perfectly! Excellent price. Most of all, excellent product! Slight fizz, big flavor and only 17 calories (Grapefruit). Use as a refreshing beverage out of the can or on ice or used in mixed drinks - outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Kleist

customer_reviews.title: bad  product
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like this because of being from natural fruits. So gross in taste. Tastes nothing like real fruit. Would not advice buying this, but that is just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Norine Ehrler

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flavor of these sparkling waters with a touch of fruit juice. I especially like the lemon and grapefruit. I feel they are a little too expensive compared to regular sparkling water.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Reader

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: These are yummy and tasty! Very low calorie drink and they’re perfect for me! I don’t even like grapefruit and the one with grapefruit is actually very good!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only one that tastes good is the Lemon
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with all the flavors other than the lemon. The grapefruit was so so. But the other flavors tasted like fruit that went bad. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R.

customer_reviews.title: Sour
customer_reviews.text: Our family enjoys Bubly and La Croix and when I saw a lightning deal on these I was excited to try a new flavor. We all thought the taste was off and really sour. I would not purchase these again. I’m curious if we had a bad batch or it actually has a sour taste.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kern

customer_reviews.title: it's so heckin real.
customer_reviews.text: It's the realest. Absolutely natural, honest, and heckin good. The calorie, carb, and sugar content differs from flavor to flavor, cause it's the realest. Not zero carb, not zero sugar. But highly negligible, and real. "Natural flavors" is trash. This has real juice.
customer_reviews.author: Bugaloo Alf

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I like certain flavors . I did not like all flavors. The lemon is great because it tastes like lemonade. spendrift has very weak flavors and not enough bubbles. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jappad

customer_reviews.title: Spindrift ~ refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I actually have changed my order from the multi-pack to just the LIME flavor as it is my favorite. They are all delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jolyn L Bowler

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and doesn't taste good at ALL
customer_reviews.text: Why mixing two totally different fruits like Rasberry & Lemon - Orange & Mango. Its not GOOD. Taste HORRIBLE. Just leave them simple, only Rasberry or only Mango Don't mix them....
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: A staple in my home.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this product. I fell in love with the grapefruit and lemon right of the bat. My family loves the orange mango. I love the variety option but I wish there were other variations of flavor. Other than that, this product is a staple in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Rushing9989

customer_reviews.title: Taste different
customer_reviews.text: I'll stick to my Bubly. Everyone has different tastes - I didn't care for Spindrift as much as I really wanted to because of the natural flavors.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m officially a Spindrifter. These are so addicting and delicious! The natural juice really adds to the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Yuck not for us
customer_reviews.text: Blah - taste terrible nobody in the family like these. Terrible had to pour into pitcher and add Gingerale so I wouldn’t have to throw away all of this and drink it myself. Nobody in the family would touch it after trying the flavors
customer_reviews.author: Scotty KSM

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE TASTE- DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a decent buy because I’ve been out of seltzer waters. Omg it is terrible. The flavor is God awful- orange mango I thought would be my favorite and it tastes like throw up. Spare yourself the money and disgust.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Sparkling Water
customer_reviews.text: I like that this company uses REAL fruit to flavor the drinks. Good tasting and good for you if you are a sparking water fan!
customer_reviews.author: gogreennow

customer_reviews.title: Great variety and tasting beverage
customer_reviews.text: Loved trying the different flavors. I love the natural taste of this product and only 10 calories. I didn’t love the orange mango but that’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: J. England

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of flavors! My family drinks them so fast they’re gone in a couple of days!
customer_reviews.author: dorisk8s

customer_reviews.title: Flavorless
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that since it had some actual juice in it there might be more flavor. Plain carbonated water with Real Lemon or cherry or orange extract and a packet of Stevia is much, much better than this is.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: pretty yucky
customer_reviews.text: the flavors all taste a little off -- carbonation is great but something just isn't right. i ordered a box for my coworkers and all of us were like :/ ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution it HAS calories and they ruin the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love all the enhanced sparkling water like Bubly, Perrier, Pellegrino. This variety pack was overpriced and undrinkable. The lemon tasted like a rotting lemon slice fell into your water with a half used splenda.
customer_reviews.author: bigdeal

customer_reviews.title: Yucky
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t drink this nor would I ever recommend it. I have tried several of the ones I got. It is only a hint of flavor and no sweetness. My husband didn’t like them either. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go in expecting too much or you’ll be let down.
customer_reviews.text: They advertise that it has some fruit juice and that it tastes great but, it doesn’t taste nearly as good as they make it out to be or for what I was expecting, I thought it would definitely taste better than it did.
customer_reviews.author: John wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ON THE MARKET!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Spindrift. It is absolutely the best seltzer water there is. No junk. Water and fruit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eobie

customer_reviews.title: 🤮🤮
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how anybody drinks this. Flavor is Terrible. If you’re on the fence about buying this I would say do not!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin e redburn

customer_reviews.title: Spindrift A Gift Worth Giving
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing Spindrift has the best flavors No guilt! How do I ship to another address as gift?
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Ele

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Spindrift Sparkling Water is perfect for a refreshing low calories drink . I enjoyed all the flavors but Grapefruit is a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Megans Bay

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I gave up artificial sweetners and don't drink sugary drinks These are great for vodka mixers!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious fruity water.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious low/no sugar fruity water that is a great, healthier substitute for diet soda. Also reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: The best sparkling water!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these drinks! They are tasty and don’t have any sweetners in them. I feel like they have more flavor then plegrinos or other carbonated flavored waters. It’s a great way to help get your in daily amount of water! Super refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Card

customer_reviews.title: Flavored Water with Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the touch of fruit juice in these. When I drink other sparkling waters, I always have to add a little something-lime juice or lemon or orange. These are great as is. I found the cucumber one surprising tasty...and good with gin. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: maegan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this as an alternative to other sparkling fruit juices because there's not enough fruit to make the carb count significant. It's a nice treat for someone like me who is pre-diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: M. Angell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I am not a big fan of sparkling water, but these are by far the best unsweetened sparkling waters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try a different brand than what I'm use to, it's okay. Probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Shylin

customer_reviews.title: The best soda ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than bubly, la croix, perrier, San pelligrino... you name it!
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite seltzer in the game
customer_reviews.text: The BEST tasting seltzer out there. Has a hint of real juice in it so there’s real flavor. Great mixer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst tasting sparking water I have ever had. The fruit flavors were sour and left a bad after taste. The carbonation was almost flat. Not refreshing. Bubly is much more crisp and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Orange Mango
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flavors in the following order. Grapefruit < Raspberry Lime < Lemon < Orange Mango. The Orange Mango in my opinion was just awful. All others were good.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnarok

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: tastes good, easy to handle the case of drink cans. thanks
customer_reviews.author: H. Green

customer_reviews.title: Better than La Croix
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind the extra 3-10 calories (depending on flavor), to my taste buds, these are tremendously tastier than la croix - orange mango in particular!
customer_reviews.author: Pura Vida

customer_reviews.title: Everything you didn't know you wanted from seltzer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect seltzer. I don't know how else to explain it. It's like the actual juice and the fizzy fizz. It's a Jazzy Fizzle producshizzle. I can't say enough nice things about this. It combines the best of juice and seltzer; you might call it the Biggie Duets. If they send me free ones, I will make video after video. Ohmagaw.
customer_reviews.author: mutabelle

customer_reviews.title: Good refreshing drink.
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and refreshing drinks. Would like to see a couple other flavors be made available.
customer_reviews.author: Cableguy

customer_reviews.title: My fav fuzzy wawa
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to fuzzy wawa just like everyone else. Getting spindrift delivered to the door with the elusive mango flavor is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if I wanted to order drinks off of Amazon but arrived perfect (no dents or busted product) Shipping was fast too and I like the variety of flavors it comes with. Some of these flavors are hard to find at the stores but you can enjoy it with just one click... so win win!
customer_reviews.author: Megumi Pair

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: These are so good and don't have any bad ingredients. It's not great to drink out of a can, but these are one of the few sparkling waters that are canned but not lined with plastics containing BPA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Awful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a whole case if this and wish I hadn't. Every flavor tastes terrible. I am not sure how to describe it but it isn't fruity at all and has a bad after taste. I purchased because it was "ALL NATURAL" but this is the worst sparkling water I have ever tasted. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Engel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you like fruit juice and seltzer together you will like this. It isn’t sweet but it tastes great and is refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: You get an extra flavor that is not found in Costco
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered these drinks in Costco. Costco's case doesn't include the mango flavor. I really enjoy these carbonated waters. They are not too sweet and the juice flavor is subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Healthy - HOW!?
customer_reviews.text: Each can only had 3 maybe four ingredients at most, under 10 calories, only uses natural fruit, tastes, delicious, and is not a bad price! I have tried about every flavored water out there and this one so far beats out all the competition.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stine

customer_reviews.title: Finally a drink with flavor that doesn't feel like I'm sucking down liquid candy.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy that this drink only has a small amount of juice and is not "enhanced" by adding tons of unnecessary sugar OR artificial sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Golemere

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor for a sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best flavors int he sparkling water category. Better than bubly / la croix, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AdamandBandit

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!! My new favorite drink
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste- my favorite so far is the raspberry lime and the lemon. I wish they had the blackberry flavor in this package too.
customer_reviews.author: Sidrah

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on sale on Prime Day. It was a great deal but I like the taste of other brands better.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marrapodi

customer_reviews.title: great flavored water
customer_reviews.text: great taste. healthy drink but with great flavor twist unlike plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Marlys Knepper

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It’s flavors can sucker punch your tastebuds. This isn’t something I’d drink on the regular, but rather as a mixer for an adult beverage. Ended up giving these away.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Musick

customer_reviews.title: damaged cans
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cans in my order were slightly smashed on the top, making some of them difficult, if not impossible, to open since they appear to have been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: janet

product_meta.title: Spindrift Sparkling Water, 4 Flavor Variety Pack, Made with Real Squeezed Fruit, 12 Fl Oz Cans, Pack of 20 Seltzer Water Cans
product_meta.description: Flavor:4 Flavor Original Variety Pack| *:WaterThe Spindrift Variety Pack captures the full range of our flavors. Since there's 4 different flavors, you'll have one for every occasion and person who comes your way. With Raspberry Lime, Grapefruit, Orange Mango, and Lemon, you'll get a full range of flavor from light and crisp to tart and tangy. Spindrift is simple and real--unsweetened and free of any added flavors, essences, or other additives, and it never contains anything artificial. Just real fruit and sparkling water. A great substitute for soda, juice, and seltzer water, Spindrift can be enjoyed straight from a chilled can, poured over ice, or as a delicious mixer for your favorite cocktail. Each pack contains 5 cans of each flavor.
feature_bullets: Pack includes 20 sparkling water cans (12 fluid ounces per can): lemon (5 cans), grapefruit (5 cans), raspberry Lime (5 cans), and orange Mango (5 cans)
Spindrift is more refreshing and flavorful than water from a sparkling water maker
Unsweetened, no added sugar, Gluten-free, non-GMO, Kosher, never from concentrate
Lightly Carbonated, slightly pulpy, and with a fuller flavor than regular sparkling water, carbonated water, and seltzer water
Made with real squeezed fruit from family farms

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
